extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the world of Space Mines - Minesweeping the galaxy!Space Mines in a challenging puzzle game that has you looking for dangerous floating mines in outer space. Luckily, the system will warn you when mines are close and where to find them!Easy mode is a quick, fun mode with only 10 bombs to discover. Meanwhile, the game's hard mode has you looking for 25 bombs!* Stimulates the brain* Snappy Graphics* Atmospheric music* Two difficulty modes* Levels are never the sameKeywords: mines, sweeper, space, bomb, puzzle, explode, grid, dynamite, scifi, science, fiction, star, challenge, arcade

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Very cool and mind breaking game!
reviews.author: steven verbeek
